Michael McCarthy

Chicago
Urban Planning | Web Design | Photography

About Michael

Education

Michael will attend the begin the Masters program in Urban Planning and Policy in Fall 2017 at the University of Illinois at Chicago (UIC). He holds a Bachelor of Science in Journalism from the Medill School of Journalism, Media, Integrated Marketing Communications at Northwestern University.

Work

Michael has interned at Newsy, an online video news company, and Chicago's Department of Cultural Affairs and Special Events, where he worked on the Farmers Markets program.

Michael currently works at Lottie's Pub in Chicago and volunteers with Northwestern University Model United Nations and Chicago International Model United Nations.

Projects

NUMUN Portal

Newsy Experts Series

Farmers Market Toolkit

DCASE WordPress

Skills

Web Design/Development

Michael is a self-taught web developer with several years of experience tinkering with web projects. He is proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript/jQuery, PHP, and MySQL. He is currently learning Ruby on Rails.

Video Editing and Motion Graphics

Michael can edit a basic news package on deadline using either Final Cut Pro X or Adobe Premiere. He can also create custom motion graphics in Apple Motion.

Contact Start Bootstrap

Feel free to email us to provide some feedback on our templates, give us suggestions for new templates and themes, or to just say hello!
